constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 26 (Wednesday, February 9, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PERRY:
H.R. 6689
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H1115]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to repeal certain employee protective arrangements, and for other purposes.
